appeals: Court of Justice of the European Union, (for reference, but only on points of European Union law (EU law) and with the permission of the High Court of Justiciary, before remitting the case back to the High Court of Justiciary for determination)  http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/1996/513/schedule/2/part/VII/chapter/31/made    https://www.scotcourts.gov.uk/docs/default-source/rules-and-practice/rules-of-court/criminal-procedure/part-7/chapter-31.doc?sfvrsn=14  , , Supreme Court of the United Kingdom, (UK Supreme Court), (only on points of "devolution issues" under the Scotland Act 1998 (excluding "compatibility issues" under the Scotland Act 2012 (which the UKSC must refer the case back to the High Court of Justiciary for determination)), or on points of European Union law (EU law), or on points of the Human Rights Act 1998 and the European Convention of Human Rights, or some or all of the aforementioned),  https://www.supremecourt.uk/docs/jurisdiction-of-the-supreme-court-in-scottish-appeals.pdf  https://twitter.com/joannaccherry/status/901852521337163777
